snippet: A U.S. Air Force investigation into exam cheating by America's nuclear missile officers has widened, with roughly double the original 34 officers now under review, a U.S. official said on Tuesday, speaking on condition of anonymity....

headline.print_headline: More U.S. Nuclear Missile Officers Implicated in Cheating Scandal
headline.main: More U.S. Nuclear Missile Officers Implicated in Cheating Scandal

lead_paragraph: A U.S. Air Force investigation into exam cheating by America's nuclear missile officers has widened, with roughly double the original 34 officers now under review, a U.S. official said on Tuesday, speaking on condition of anonymity.
